IImagePool

Interface that allocates a pool of images

Module

import Imaging.Image.IImagePool

Functions
Acquire
virtual CRefObj<IImage> Acquire(
uint32 width,
uint32 height,
uint32 bpp
) = 0

Acquires a new image from the pool, either by allocating an image or reusing an existing image

Parameters
width
uint32

width of desired image in pixels

height of desired image in pixels
